definition: inactive but capable of becoming active
details:
adjective
- inactive but capable of becoming active
= example: inactive but capable of becoming active
= synonyms: abeyant
- (of e.g. volcanos) not erupting and not extinct
= example: (of e.g. volcanos) not erupting and not extinct
= synonyms: inactive
- in a condition of biological rest or suspended animation
= example: in a condition of biological rest or suspended animation
= synonyms: torpid
- lying with head on paws as if sleeping
= synonyms: sleeping
